document_data.name: Arren
document_data.mainbody: '''Arren''' was a male [[human]] butler of Lord [[Temar]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Arren was Lord Temar's butler, who assisted him.
document_data.History: If the [[Kalach-Cha]] and companions accepted Sir [[Nevalle]]'s quest, they needed to visit Lord Temar. Arren would lead them to Lord Temar, then come to Temar's assistance to attack the Kalach-Cha soon after.
